website_summaries.verdict: If you're particular about your toast, this is the toaster oven for you. Includes all the features you want with a toaster oven as well.
pros: Includes an extra wide toaster on top with separate toast shade selector, which many buyers say makes better toast than a regular toaster oven
Includes a 60-minute timer with auto shutoff
cons: Some buyers say the rear bottom heating element sometimes doesn't work

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Very Convenient for Small Meals
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for small meals, and the integrated pop-up toaster allows for a simple method to toast bread and bagels. Yes, the enclosure does get hot; for this price point, one shouldn't expect an insulated appliance.
customer_reviews.author: JJ_Jungle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The toast lever wouldn't stay down when I tried to engage it so I could not use the toaster function. Then when I read other reviews and saw that the heating element on the oven part had problems, I checked that too and sure enough the back element did not work. So both functions of this toaster /oven were defective. I have had a smaller version of this for about ten years with no problems and loved it. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottom rear filament does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Just like so many other stated, The bottom rear filament does not work. Thank you to everybody who posted the same thing as I checked this before I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Bevin

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, design.
customer_reviews.text: This oven is a significant step backwards from the equivalent model from 2009. The toaster part is poorly designed with items not resting securely inside, flimsy structure inside. The oven door doesn’t pull the tray out so you need to use a tool or your hands. The main issue is the disfunctional toaster. I’ve waited 6 months to write this review thinking I would get used to it but I have not. Very low quality.
customer_reviews.author: cs

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy with this item,It takes too long to cook your food and some of the food is still raw like a frozen pizza. It also leaves a bad taste on the food. Im going to keep it cause I dnt feel like packing it up and sending it back. But will never buy kitchen Items again I will go to a store. The toaster does its job, now I have a $60 toaster. 😤😤😤
customer_reviews.author: MARGIE

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The toaster was straightforward. It was a little tricky to figure out how get the oven to come one. So much easier to clean than a conventional toaster. I like how it toasts and I can bake things hear when I don't want to turn one my regular oven. This is the larger model, but still uses much less space than two appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Think hard before buying
customer_reviews.text: Went with the name brand and got duped. Ad picture shows bagel being toasted. Don't know where they get their bagels but mine come from Einstein's and when you drop it in for toasting the bagel doesn't extend above top of toaster. Result is burned fingers trying to extract. This holds true with any toast. Uneveness in Browning every use. If mine isn't defective then the engineers at Hamilton need retraining. Company should include tweezers to extract toast. Top labeling regarding HOT SURFACE needs to be emphasized.
customer_reviews.author: Basil Asaro

customer_reviews.title: We wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: We loved the idea of having two in one without taking up too much space. But the back/bottom element did not work. We exchanged it for another model and still had the same issue. We ended up returning the replacement and going with another option. We wanted to love it but didn’t want to spend money on a defective item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on buying a toaster oven or toaster due to the lack of counter space but I wanted to be able to teach my son how to cook his own lunch and he loves having bagels for breakfast. This has given him so many more food options and has saved so much space!
customer_reviews.author: AmericanSweatheart

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, attractive and functional
customer_reviews.text: Great design and toasts quickly and evenly. In fact, it toasts bagels in under 3 minutes, which is faster than described in the accompanying manual. It's also an attractive oven that looks nice on the counter. It does release quite a bit of heat while toasting as one might expect, given that the top toast door is open during toasting. This is no different than any other vertical toaster though. I simply slide the oven out from under the cabinet before toasting because the cabinet is only 6 inches above the oven and I believe that that is too close to be safe. Overall, a very nice appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M. Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Best toast of any toaster oven I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this toaster oven for about a month. I use it practically every night and have been very happy with it. The controls are simple, it heats quickly and cooks well. Most surprisingly, it makes great toast! The toaster slot on the top is unique, as far as I know, and results in perfectly even, browned toast. Finally someone figured out how to do this! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Olney

customer_reviews.title: Works great, both as a toaster and as an oven
customer_reviews.text: Works great, both as a toaster and as an oven. This is not a small piece, so read the measurements carefully. Very powerful, so dial those toaster settings back until you know what your mileage will actually be. In all, this is a great idea to combination countertop kitchen appliance.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you want top toaster portion to work
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was clever, best of both worlds. It's not. The top toaster part doesn't work well at all. Highest/darkest setting still requires 2 rounds of toasting and even then it's not toasted well. I didn't really use the bottom part. I tried it for toast but it didn't work any better than the top. Tried this for a full year and finally gave up. I'm going back to a regular toaster. :(
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Toaster portion does not accommodate small slices of bread- they fall into the bottom of the toaster oven. The toaster does not pop up high enough to let you take the bread out with your hand you have to use a fork. Also, you have to take out a shelf each time you want to use the toaster and then put it back.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Terrible! Massive recall a must
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the reviews of how this machine malfunctions I still have it a shot. Big mistake! Just like many others one of the bottom heating racks are not working. Terrible purchase!
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Always burns toast/bagels
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it had the pop up toaster feature but it is a HUGE disappointment. Toast and bagels do not eject when done - even at the lowest possible setting. If you don't stand over it and watch, your toast or bagels are burnt to a crisp and wasted. This is not an issue of the toast/bagel being too big and getting stuck. I do not recommend this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work - new out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Brand new - just arrived - doesn’t toast! The lever won’t even stay down! I will be returning and going with a different manufacturer. If it doesn’t work when it’s brand new I don’t want to risk getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baker

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd had this for the last ten years
customer_reviews.text: So easy--so well thought out! Kudos to the engineers who designed this toaster oven, because it works like a dream and makes your life easier. Perfect toast from the toaster, and great baked potatoes and toasted cheese sandwiches from the oven. Even great for warming up cold pizza. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Valentine

customer_reviews.title: wanted a "toaster oven" that operated like a conventional toaster
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a short time but seems to work very well. wanted a "toaster oven" that operated like a conventional toaster. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: watson driggs

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Wondered whether this would actually be able to replace a toaster and toaster-oven, and it does! In fact it toasts more evenly than any toaster I've had, and I've had a few. The only negative thing is that when baking at high temps, e.g. 400+ F, you must have the rack on the lower position or your food will be burnt on top.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bornemann

customer_reviews.title: Oven Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box I immediately noticed a musty odor, the cardboard surrounding the oven was sort of soft like when it was wet at one point. It's like it was in a really wet environment. Anyway, I thought I would test it out and just clean it really good, I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it just because of that. I plugged it in and the oven did not work at all. The toaster part worked but the oven would not turn on. I tried everything. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, actually no customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toaster oven to replace my old one. It is bigger than the last and I can live with that....BUT what I can’t live with is the handle broke a month ago, not long after I bought it and I have reached out to Hamilton Beach via phone message and email and they have not returned either. It is really hard to open and close the door with only two screws instead of a handle. VERY DISAPPOINTING LACK OF CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice add to the kitchen!  Relying less on the microwave...
customer_reviews.text: We bought in our attempt to reduce microwave usage. Seems like irradiated foods is a good thing to reduce consumption from, but the bonus has been crisper food, cooked in a way that doesn’t unevenly heat, nor leaves the food spongy, gooey, or tough. You do have to monitor cooking as it can heat up your food quicker than what you might think. Looks nice on the counter as well! Follow instructions and most should do well with this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not there best quality
customer_reviews.text: In the ad it claims it’s 40% faster, I’d like to know faster than what? it’s very slow on toasting bread very uneven toasting, The broil function will put you to sleep waiting for it to get hot, not happy with this item, I’d like to Hamilton Beach toaster oven I had before, wish I hadn’t thrown it away, because that’s what I might do with this
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Riseling

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job, but takes a lot longer
customer_reviews.text: Works as a toaster oven should, but if you are in a hurry for toast in the morning, buy a toaster. It does a good job, but takes a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good toaster/oven
customer_reviews.text: Decent toaster/oven. Not much going on here as far as bells and whistles. The toast slots are nice to have and work well and are reasonably quick. Toast comes out fairly even. As some have mentioned, the back bottom element looks as if it isn’t working, but it does actually work as intended. If all you intend on doing is reheating some things like frozen pizza or making toast, this is a reasonably priced unit within a decent size that can meet most of your needs fairly well. We’re happy enough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I use to cook without this!
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a toaster oven before this and now can't believe I didn't! It's great for heating up pizza, grilled cheese sandwhiches and baking! The most awesome is having the toaster too! I have the toaster oven and toaster all in 1! More counter space saved! I've only tried bread and english muffins in the toaster, but it did great. The only thing that may be an inconvenience for some is that it will only do 3 pieces of bread or 3 halves of english muffin at a time. That's ok with me because it's only me and my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The toaster part of this product stopped working 1 week after I received it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful product! I thought it would be perfect cause I liked the fact that it was a pop-up toaster and not a traditional toaster oven toaster. I liked the idea that it was compact with both features, oven and toaster available with one unit. Exactly one week after receiving this, the toaster stopped working! It will not allow the toast to stay down when pressed. I took it to a repair shop and they couldn’t do anything with it. They said, they’ve never had good luck with Hamilton Beach products. Unfortunately, I tossed away the box, thinking I wouldn’t need to return it. Lesson learned. Bottom line, don’t purchase this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Saves me room in my counter. We love to beat up pizza, but don’t want the hassle of a big oven. This is roomy & does an excellent job on reheating. I’ve also cooked biscuits on here! I’m sure this is saving us $$ on our electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean !
customer_reviews.text: The fact that I can pull out the bottom alone for cleaning is amazing and the reason I bought it! This oven is so easy to keep clean therefore no burning smell when you keep heating food because no food gets stuck at the bottom. I use it for reheating and toasting and I love it. Save counter space with the toaster built in !
customer_reviews.author: Shop76

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I live with roommates and some of us like the toaster oven to make things like garlic bread and reheating pizza. I like the pop-up toasters as I find they toast bread better. This combination toaster gave us the best of both worlds. Toasts great, easy clean-up, and we saved on counter space by not having two appliances. The opening for the pop-up toaster has a sliding shield so it's not just an open vent when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Broadway

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 2 in 1 counter top oven with long slot toaster stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best toaster oven I have owned and I have owned four. It toast's, bakes and broils perfectly. Since I received it I have baked chicken cordon bleu & brownies. Broiled a steak and toasted English muffins and bread. Everything comes out of this oven perfectly. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: sea_star_777

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: I was glad I was able to find this again. It had been discontinued. Toaster oven is nicely structured. The temperature is even when using the toaster. Using the grill the only complain would be wished they came in non stick base. But I was in heaven to know they are back on the market but without Amazon I wouldn't have got it cause every store I went they had the model but not the extra to buy. Good product! I always receive the items always a couple days before due date and in great condition. I will continue to shop using Amazon. No problem what's so ever!👍👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy 2-in-1 appliance
customer_reviews.text: We have always had both a toaster and toaster oven, but after a kitchen remodeling were looking for ways to declutter the counter. The Hamilton Beach 2-in-1 is the only product of its kind and we are very pleased with our purchase. I think it makes better toast than our stand-alone toaster and the pull-out crumb tray is easy to clean. The broil and bake oven functions all work fine. The only caveat is that everything except the handle gets very hot, especially when broiling, so you have to be careful. We pull it out from under the upper cabinet when in use. Despite that, we are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RFG

customer_reviews.title: Complete Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It's a total game changer! Anyone who buys Seattle's Best Sourdough bread knows firsthand the struggle of toasting in a conventional toaster because the slices are long - but NOW! I can toast a whole piece perfectly everytime without having to flip the toast and suffer through a burnt middle. And the counter space saved by getting rid of the toaster and toaster oven is huge. This toasts perfectly every time, and the oven part is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: SV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Toaster Oven!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent toaster oven. Solidly made. Two separate levels for rack for cooking. Toaster is perfect. Timer for cooking. Makes noise when heating up guess it's the steel expanding?
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: Well we do like this appliance. Good toast, good baking, quality feel to the door and controls, attractive yet functional design. Remarks: It gets hot on top, possibly more so than out previous unit. Toaster apparatus takes a little space in the oven chamber, but it is not crowded. Dropped one star on 'easy to clean' because NO toaster oven is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun appliance
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it says. Toaster fits two slices of bread and toasts fine, but if you first add up to four more pieces in the over, the toaster will cook them up too! So that makes it a six slicer when needed. Not fancy, not terrible, is a toaster and oven, super fun. Temp adjustments works well. Oven is small but magically fits most sized foods I cooked in my old, much larger one. Cooks fast so the oven seal seems good. The back coil is not supposed to stay red. So far, we like it fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Magnificant Toast OVEN
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many toaster ovens over the last several years, and none of them lasted, When I saw this i bought it immediately. WE ALL LOVE it. It is larger, but not giant, toast comes out perfect, not to mention out delight of putting pizza etc in the oven to heat. it is the best money we spent and we all love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Got to get one.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this toaster oven. It's so convenient to have a toaster and the oven in one. I no longer have to pull out my toaster when I just want toast. I have limited counter space so this is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: This is a Toy, not a useful appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a joke when I opened the box. This unit is smaller than an easy bake oven. I'm not sure what you could actually use this for. It is way too small to be practical in any way. This is a toy, not a useful appliance. Look else where!
customer_reviews.author: TeraLyn Rocknak

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY -Toaster Part Broke After Second Use
customer_reviews.text: Toaster Part Broke After Second Use. Great idea, just a waste of my time to get it in and now I have to ship it back which is a huge pain. Not only is that an issue, you can't tell how dark you want toast when not using the toaster. So this is a bad system.
customer_reviews.author: SCG

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp and works well
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and we like the adjustable rack option. Cooks food nicely and heats up well. After reading the reviews the first thing we did was look at both of the burners to make sure they work and ours both went on.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking small meals!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for toasting bagels and making small meals in lieu of firing up the regular oven. Works great for small pizzas (e.g., Totinos square pizzas). We use it probably once a day on average. Also like how it shuts off after the baking time you set which our regular oven does not so as my teenagers have forgotten to turn that off many times.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany247365

customer_reviews.title: The best for me
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven does a lot. It will defrost. Has convection oven , reg. oven, broiler and makes excellent toast. I tried 3 other ones and I love this one. Regarding the toast, it is a little slower than a pop up toaster. That doesn't bother me. I use it every day and can put 6 toasts in at one time. It also lights up inside when in action.
customer_reviews.author: NJ flower

customer_reviews.title: A House Warming  Gift
customer_reviews.text: We gave this toaster oven to our adult grandson as a gift as he was moving into his first apartment. Every time we see him, he tells how much he likes it. He uses it daily and for many things, especially quick pizza, and bagels in the morning. It's nice when you gift someone something that they use and like.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Most used countertop appliance in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I'd had a Hamilton Beach 2 in 1 for more than a decade and it was getting long in the tooth. This new one is so much better. It has a larger oven area and, thanks to the glass door, monitoring toast is a snap. Additionally, the toaster "eject" button is a great feature. This unit is so versatile I can't believe everyone doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Still in the Middle on this one
customer_reviews.text: Bread release stuck unable to move. First review rejected, keeping it simple...
customer_reviews.author: MY-VU

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and efficient!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit! It heats and bakes food VERY quickly and evenly. I've had it for 6 months already and I use it every day as an alternative to the microwave which is now donated elsewhere. Cooks pizza in 10 minutes, casseroles in 25, cakes and pies in 20, toasts bread and tortillas in 3! The small space makes all the difference and is perfect size for singles or couples.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsycyn

customer_reviews.title: Toaser option does not work great
customer_reviews.text: Every time we drop in waffles to toast since they are frozen and start to defrost they get soft and curl between the slots and its impossible to pull out from the stop. Toast works okay but not for waffles that we use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Mora

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: I hate this oven! The bread in the toaster falls into the larger oven half the time. It also gets really hot. I have it placed on our countertop and have noticed the cabinets above are warm after we use the toaster. Would not recommend and I’m already in the market to purchase another brand!
customer_reviews.author: candace reposa

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst thing I have ever purchased. It takes forever to toast or broil or just warm up. I am throwing it out! you will regret it if you buy this toaster oven
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Whether in toast mode or oven mode this is the worst performing appliance I have ever bought. It takes 10 minutes to toast whole wheat bread and it comes out unevenly toasted and super dry!!! The oven mode is no better, it doesn't really get that hot and takes forever to "broil" simple garlic bread. A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: jfortier@turtle-island.com

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: The original of this brand we had to buy 2 in two years it would spark inside and it was impossible to clean. It also like to kind of click a lot even when not on which made us nervous. This new model is perfect so far and we've been able to keep it clean. It is bigger but worth it! My husband only wants a style that has oven and toaster like this and they are hard to find, this meets his needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Maddalone

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kitchen Appliance
customer_reviews.text: I'll have to admit, I was against getting a toaster oven, but this thing won me over. It's lightweight enough to be stored away when not in use, but durable enough for the family. It's great for single/double servings of snacks or individual pizzas. We love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Olson

customer_reviews.title: Good for older parents
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents and they love it. They have had the smaller version 2xs prior to this one. Bigger so it takes up counter space, but allows them to bake meals in it
customer_reviews.author: Kris C. Pei

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven. It is truly a space saver, its very easy to use, easy to clean and very versatile. I highly recommend this Hamilton Beach toaster oven and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Phanfixer

customer_reviews.title: Dob't listen to the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: All of you that posted bad reviews for this product must have grown up with a silver spoon in your mouth..that you swallowed and now is stuck up your a$$. This toaster oven is perfect and does everything you need. The back heating element doesn't light up?? Are you looking for a light show?? The manufacturer states that it doesn't light up because they are different wattages, but it's 100% still putting out heat and everything cooks evenly and perfect. Don't listen to the people that look for something wrong in everything since they're unhappy with their own lives in general. If you need a smaller toaster oven that also functions as a great toaster, this is a GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This Toaster/Oven does what it is supposed to do, and is easy to clean. We like heating up leftovers without having to wait and without wasting energy heating up an entire oven. No problems with it so far (have had it for about 4 months). Update: At 10 months, still using this often, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoMed

customer_reviews.title: Does not pull out tray!
customer_reviews.text: Previous models had an attachment that pulled the toaster oven pan out....this does not...burn yourself very easily...so small very hard to get pan out...other than that, I would have loved the compact toaster....😐
customer_reviews.author: dazee

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Cooks fine but has a major flaw. If you try to use the toaster oven when the switch is set to "toast" then everything appears like it's cooking but it's not. The timer starts, you walk away, and come back to cold food. The stupid thing doesn't give any indication it's not going to heat the food. Yeah, it's user error but come on, why start the timer if it's not going to cook!
customer_reviews.author: Brad Fairbanks

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: We checked the measurements of this toaster oven to make sure it would fit into our appliance garage. Per the given measurements, it would. The measurement for the width did not include the handle, which is pretty large. This did no fit and we will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: mmdallas81

customer_reviews.title: Super Oven
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he loves the top toaster as it toasts very evenly and quickly. Baked some chicken in the toaster oven last night, much faster than my old toaster oven. Very easy to use and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design
customer_reviews.text: Horrible toaster oven. The top toaster is a complete waste. The toast get stuck while down , between the oven part and the toaster. So the bread falls apart and gets stuck in between. Wish I could return. Hamilton Beach needs to go back to the drawing board. A 30.00 toaster oven from target does a much better job. Throwing this new one out
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy poo

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: It sucks. It undercooked food and the toast only half toasted plus took way too long to toast or use oven. Very small on inside
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Oven is great, toaster not so much!
customer_reviews.text: The oven works great with even heat. However, the toaster takes much longer to toast bread and it doesn't toast evenly. It looks great and I like the oven but the toaster not so much!
customer_reviews.author: TeeTee

customer_reviews.title: Broke with minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster oven in October. Has been used less than 20 times and now toaster slot will not engage and drop bread down. Toaster slot will not grab and heat up. Oven works portion fine for now. So for us it’s only an oven and we have one of those already. Thumbs down.
customer_reviews.author: Chas Weber

customer_reviews.title: bottom rear heating element
customer_reviews.text: Received my order today, tried it this evening and couldn't get it to heat to the desired temperature. Sure enough, the heating element on the bottom back wasn't working. As you can see in the picture the very front element is on (hard to see but look closely) and the way back top is on but the back element on the bottom (Middle of photo) is not burning. It should be on as the toaster oven had just started to heat up. Sending it back for a replacement! One of many things I love about Amazon! UPDATE....Amazon sent another unit to us and it works as it’s suppose to! YEAAAAAAA!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Doss

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother buying this
customer_reviews.text: The first one we got had the same problem as other purchasers: the back heating element on the bottom didn’t work. Exchanged it thru amazon. Second one we got: NEITHER of the heating elements on the bottom work. Returning this and finding another option. So annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Toaster may make this a 1 for 1
customer_reviews.text: The 2 in 1 toaster oven looked great and worked , except for 1 issue. The toaster, the slots were so deep that the bread sat very low inside the toaster. It was hard to extract the toast without putting your hands inside toaster slots. I wished there was a lever or something to help spring the toast up. We did return the unit , because of the the toaster and not being able to use it as a 2 for 1.
customer_reviews.author: Frances

customer_reviews.title: Only combination type I could find
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace an older Hamilton Beach combination toaster oven that had a broken top slot cover. It turned out to be quite an upgrade, It toasts much more evenly and has a broiler setting. It is also larger than the older one, higher and deeper making it much more versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, big oven
customer_reviews.text: Love having slot for toast and bagels on top. Old toaster oven did not always toast things well. I have not had to clean it yet but it looks easy. So far I am very pleased with it. Oven has proven to be good size.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Good build quality
customer_reviews.text: No fuss and no unnecessary buttons to just simply heat things up, great for the kids morning eggo waffles. Stays nice and clean and really is not prone to getting water spots or smudges.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Rosa

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: have seen some negetive comments I have used the toaster for months and have really been satisfied with toaster portion and bake works great and good buy
customer_reviews.author: herbert smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great, because of two way oven and toaster all together. Countertop Oven is really perfect to cook and toast the big size breads. Long Slot Toaster is perfect to toast slices .
customer_reviews.author: Homeira S.

customer_reviews.title: very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: this is a piece of junk, really, thin metal. but i love the way it looks and it does toast bagels. very tiny oven area. i don't expect it to last a year.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: We!’ve had this appliance only a week or two, so it isn’t feasible to evaluate its reliability. It’s appearance is very attractive, but the toaster function is slower than was the toaster function of our smaller Hamilton Beach toaster oven.
customer_reviews.author: edaw

customer_reviews.title: It is a second and upgrade model we bought by HB
customer_reviews.text: The 2-in-one model is space saving and handy. I bought a simpler model several years ago, but the toaster part and oven part went out respectively. My friend and family member have the exactly product and they are still going well. So I have to think mine was somehow a defected one, bad luck. We bought this one by Hamilton Beach two month ago. It is an upgraded one from the last one. We just love it!
customer_reviews.author: In WA

customer_reviews.title: Love this toaster
customer_reviews.text: Makes perfect toast, also great for muffins and garlic bread in baking area. Nice roomy inside, comes apart for cleaning, it's great to enjoy morning toast again.
customer_reviews.author: Doxiemom

customer_reviews.title: Great toast
customer_reviews.text: The first toaster oven that we have had that actually toasts. Room for bagels and thicker bread slices. The oven part works well too. We are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: F. B. Duchene

customer_reviews.title: Good size but short cord
customer_reviews.text: I had a toaster oven at my old house so when moving out of a roommate situation I bought this for myself. I LOVE this and love that I don't need a toaster, too! Only con is how short the cord is.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: love this separate toaster
customer_reviews.text: love this separate toaster... and I can still melt cheese on an english muffin in the oven... we are so happy with this concept Sometimes the english muffins or bagels are a little tricky to get out of the toaster.... it would be great if a tool (non metal fork or some kind of tweezer would be a good additon to this product)
customer_reviews.author: hocs

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an older apartment. This is exactly what I needed. It’s replaced the horrible oven in my apartment. I’m so glad I purchased it and definitely will buy as gifts for others! FYI It is bigger than a small microwave. But it’s worth the space it takes up. I’ve used it every day since it was delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Stauffer

customer_reviews.title: Toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: This is the best combo toaster/oven. Fast easy to use. Some things don’t do well heating in the microwave but this oven slows you to keep them crispy. I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Diana P.

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our camper, which has no oven. This new, bigger Toastation is even better that our older one at home. Even made a pan of brownies!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My best toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: I love the toaster oven so fare l’ve cooked biscuits dinner rolls, muffins, even made toasted sub sandwiches. It’s the best one I’ve owned. Doesn’t take up they much space and it matches everything in my kitchen 😃👍
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Katin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied with this purchase. For the amount of money, the toaster does not auto pop. You have to manually pop the toaster so if you walk away and forget you might just burn your house down!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 for 1 product
customer_reviews.text: works great for toasting bread or heating up frozen food on the toaster oven easy to clean 2 for 1 product great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Enid

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people complain about the back element not glowing red. This baby heats up food and gets it CRISPY real quick. I love this thing, the convenience factor is HUUUGE for kitchens lacking in counter space. Love love love and would recommend it any day.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Bello

customer_reviews.title: Makes great toast and cooks well
customer_reviews.text: Toast comes out perfect. It cooks chicken, sausage patties, beer battered cod, cornbread muffins and more very well. Only downfall is the pan. Juices have melted onto it and I can't even scrape it off. I now foil line the pan.
customer_reviews.author: JayDubb

customer_reviews.title: Back coils aren't a problem
customer_reviews.text: I agree with previous reviewer that although the back coils do not light up red as do the front coils, they do work. I put bread in the oven (not toaster) and baked it. I used several pieces and turned them different ways to be sure they cooked evenly and they did. I used to have the Waring model like this, but they discontinued it. Prefer the Hamilton Beach, as the oven is larger than the Waring. Have to get used to the sound when the toast pops up, it is quite loud and is startling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product works well
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job. Takes a little bit to get used to the temperature control - the right setting for what you are "toasting".
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: The best toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: The best toaster oven I have used I love the big wide toaster on the top rather than having to lay the bread in the bottom like other ovens
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: good all around, but the slot takes getting used to
customer_reviews.text: works great, easy to clean. the toaster feature doesn't produce any better results than laying it on the rack, when compared to non-slot ovens. and you may need tongs (or wait) to get your bread out, depending on it's size. it works fine, looks good and is cheap. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: SC for Consumer Justice

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my adult children had to move home for a few months and they were constantly turning on the oven. I loved that this particular model had actual slots for the toast. I had planned to give it to them when they moved back out but I couldn't part with it. I use it almost daily to warm leftover, bake a few cookies, make toast, etc. My kids liked it so much that they bought one for their house too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Two in one
customer_reviews.text: You can’t beat this idk why everyone doesn’t make this type of toaster oven. Easy to use not to expensive and takes less counter space than using two separate appliances all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: door stops closing
customer_reviews.text: Initially we were very happy with our combo toaster oven/bagel toaster. It met several needs between employees and coffee shop. However, just after a month into having it (and just past the "return window" the oven door has failed. It will no longer close all the way :(
customer_reviews.author: Bargreen's Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT Buy if you have a cupboard overhead.
customer_reviews.text: We have cupboards that are 19" above our cabinets with lighting. I turned this on and could smell the lighting starting to burn. I would only use this on a surface that does not have anything above it. It gets too hot.
customer_reviews.author: RFP

customer_reviews.title: Great little toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I use it more than my actual oven. It’s easy to use, heats things quickly. Great for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a toaster and toaster oven. Fits good on counter, does not take up a lot of room. Gets warm, so I have space between wall and cupboard for safety.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Coakley

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 2-in-1 Countertop Oven and Long Slot Toaster, Stainless Steel, 60 Minute Timer and Automatic Shut Off (31156)
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelUnclutter your counter with the Hamilton Beach 2-in-1 Oven and toaster This unique combo lets you cook personal-sized pizzas with a tender crispy crust and toast bread evenly in 40% less time than a traditional toaster oven.
feature_bullets: 2 in 1 Combination: do more in less space with this countertop oven. Bake, broil, and toast by easily switching cooking modes with the slide of a lever
Toast 40 percent faster: the 2 in 1 toaster oven toasts breads 40 percentage faster than the leading toaster oven, which means you can get your sliced bread Warm and crispy, quick
Spacious interior: with 2 rack positions and a Large interior that Fits a 9inch pizza, this toaster oven is perfect for making muffins, baked potatoes, casseroles, and more
Separate shade selector: 2 in 1 toaster oven gives you more control so you can reach the perfect level of golden brown toast

60 Minute timer with auto shutoff: set toaster oven timer up to 60 minutes with peace of mind. The auto shutoff turns the oven off when baking time is reached. There’s no need to worry about overcooking or leaving the oven on

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,594 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
